<h1 align="center">
  Tap Authentication
</h1>

This project is a prototype authentication solution for those with visual impairments.

## Running the project

1. Clone the repo to your local machine

2. Run `gatsby develop`

3. The project will be available on `localhost:8000`

## Contributing

Make sure all your work is done on a seperate branch, when you have completed a feature, submit a pull request.

## Development Stack

This site is built with React & Gatsby
